```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

The introduction should be brief and plainly state the scientific background or motivation for the project and question being asked, and any specific hypotheses being tested.

This can be 1/2 page or less of double spaced text.
